OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive trastuzumab IV 30-90 minute week 5 week . Patients also undergo external beam radiotherapy daily 5 day week 5 week . Three week completion trastuzumab radiotherapy , patient undergo surgical evaluation . Patients deem surgical candidate undergo surgery . Patients deem non-surgical candidate continue receive trastuzumab external beam radiotherapy 2 additional week .
